task.title: Create QueueMetrics System Users
task.shortdesc: QueueMetrics provides Agentâ€™s page, that is, a specialized page from which agents can log on, log off, go to pause, see processed calls and do other activities as well.

taskbody.context: To enable the system users, you need to create a log-on for each agent that matches exactly the agent code you used in the agent definition, so e.g. for extension 5001 you would use Agent/5001.

step.cmd: Go to Home Edit QueueMetrics settings Administer users , click Create New.
Configure the User Detail and click Save.

ul.li: Login: The format is Agent/{extension number}. For example, Agent/5001.
Password: Set a password for the user.
Real name: Enter the agent's name.

step.cmd: To check if your changes have been successful, try to log in with the system user.
